article_title: An opioid treatment model spawns imitators
article_text: BALTIMORE -- Dr. Kenneth Stoller held court on the sidewalk outside the Broadway Center for Addiction on a recent sunny afternoon, chatting with a troop of lingering patients. He beamed as he patted a young man on the shoulder and said he'd see him tomorrow.

article_metadata.title: An opioid treatment model spawns imitators | SunHerald
